name: Raditya Firman S
bio: Hello! I'm Raditya, a passionate software engineer with over 2 years of hands-on experience in building robust web applications. My journey in tech started with a curiosity for how things work on the internet, which quickly evolved into a career focused on creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly digital solutions.

I specialize in full-stack development, with a particular focus on enterprise systems. I thrive in environments where performance and reliability are paramount. Whether it's architecting a new internal tool to streamline operations or optimizing an existing platform for better user experience, I approach every challenge with a problem-solving mindset and a keen eye for detail.
